newsitem.title: GREECE: ATTICA ENTERPRISES SAYS RIGHTS ISSUE COMPLETE.
newsitem.headline: ATTICA ENTERPRISES SAYS RIGHTS ISSUE COMPLETE.

text.p: Passenger shipper Attica Enterprises said in a statement that its 8.146 billion drachma rights issue was succesfully completed on Thursday.
The company issued 5,256,000 common bearer shares at 1,550 drachmas each. The terms were one new share per five outstanding.

Attica Enterprises will use 70 percent of the proceeds to up the share capital of its wholly-owned subsidiary Superfast Ferries Maritime SA with an eye to finance current and future building of ships.
The remainder will go towards financing its working capital needs. --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
